name: 4th International Conference on Advanced Research in Supply Chain Management
content: The dynamic city of Amsterdam, Netherlands will be the host of the 4th International Conference on Advanced Research in Supply Chain Management. SUPPLYCHAINCONF 2024 offers its attendees three days of immersive learning experience and engaging discussions. However, beyond that, this supply chain conference is your chance to join a global community of leading academics and help shape the future of the field. Whether you are looking to present the findings of your latest research or learn from the unique perspectives and experiences of your peers, SUPPLYCHAINCONF provides you with the perfect platform to do just that. PLUS, you have a chance to get published in prestigious academic journals, which will help advance your career, open up new funding opportunities, and contribute to the global discourse. If you can’t make it to Amsterdam on the 28th – 30th of June, you can still take advantage of the opportunities of the supply chain management conference by joining as a virtual participant.
